mapper.select: SELECT substring_index(OD.order_num,'-',1) AS orderDate, OD.order_num, PD.pro_name, SUM(DT.detail_cnt) AS detail_cnt, DT.stus, OD.m_id FROM product_order OD JOIN order_detail DT ON OD.order_num=DT.order_num JOIN product PD ON PD.pro_no=DT.pro_no WHERE m_id=#{s_m_id} GROUP BY OD.order_num, PD.pro_name
SELECT substring_index(TT.tck_num,'-',1) AS orderDate, TT.tck_num, TT.m_id, TT.c_no, TT.cnt, TT.stus, CC.title, CC.date FROM ticket_order TT JOIN concert CC ON TT.c_no=CC.c_no WHERE m_id=#{s_m_id}
